name: note.midi
description: Get the midi number of a note

scripts.build: npm test && npm run docs && npm run coverage && npm run disc && npm run dist
scripts.dist: browserify index.js | uglifyjs > dist/note.midi.min.js&& ls -hall dist/
scripts.disc: browserify --full-paths index.js | uglifyjs | discify > tmp/disc.html&& open tmp/disc.html
scripts.climate: npm run coverage && npm run codeclimate

author: danigb
